translation.en: Jesus Christ! I haven't done drugs in 20 years.
translation.it: Cristo santo! Non seguo la droga da 20 anni. Non so cosa sto guardando.

translation.en: I don't even know what I'm lookin' at here.
translation.it: Non seguo la droga da 20 anni. Non so cosa sto guardando.

translation.en: [Hawk] Fentanyl, oxy, coke.
It's half the drugs in New England.
translation.it: È metà della droga del New England.

translation.en: Isn't this just gonna piss 'em off?
Yeah, it's gonna piss 'em off once they end up in federal prison, absolutely.
translation.it: Li farà incazzare finire in una prigione federale? Certo.

translation.en: Uh, I don't know if it's enough.
You don't know if it's enough?
What is wrong with you? [Cosgrove] It's just a truck full of drugs!
translation.it: - Ma che cazzo ti prende? - È solo un furgone pieno di droga.

translation.en: If I gave you a photograph of them smiling and holding it, -you'd say it wasn't authenticated. -No, that'd be good.
translation.it: Una foto mentre la tengono in mano non sarebbe stata autentica.

translation.en: -Yeah. -Them holding it? Huh?
If I gave you a video tape, you'd say it was doctored.
translation.it: Se ti dessi un video, diresti che è falso.

translation.en: If I walked them into court with the drugs in their hands,
translation.it: Se li portassi in tribunale con la droga in mano,

translation.en: you'll say they were coerced. You're unbelievable.
translation.it: diresti che sono stati forzati. Sei incredibile.

translation.en: -[barking continues] -Calm down.
-Shit! -This is not good.
That dude ID'd us.
Ringo, what's wrong? What's wrong, baby?
translation.it: Ringo, che c'è? Che c'è, tesoro? Che succede?

translation.en: What is it, baby? What's up, baby?
-What is it, Ringo? -[barking] Whose van is that?
translation.it: Che c'è, Ringo? Di chi è quel furgone?

translation.en: That's... It's Hawk's. He got a job.
translation.it: È di Hawk. Ha trovato un lavoro.

translation.en: -Yeah. -I'm just helping him.
-It's just like a side hustle thing. -[Cissy] Uh-huh.
You know what Ringo here's job was before he retired?
translation.it: Sai cosa faceva Ringo prima di andare in pensione?

translation.en: -Do you know what his main hustle was? -[Hawk] What?
He was a narcotics dog.
-Don't let that thing in here! -Oi! Oi!
[Spenser] Go back inside. I need you guys-- What the fuck is that?
translation.it: - Torna dentro. Devo... - Che cazzo è?

translation.en: You brought drugs into my garage?
translation.it: Hai portato droga nel mio garage?

translation.en: Just do me a favor. Go back in the house with Henry.
translation.it: Per favore, torna in casa con Henry.

translation.en: What did you do?
[Cissy] Spenser!
[Spenser] I told everybody to stay in the house.
translation.it: Vi avevo detto di rimanere qui.

translation.en: -Spenser! -Where's Henry?
translation.it: Vi avevo detto di rimanere qui. - Dov'è Henry? - Non è qui.

translation.en: -He's not here. -Why is he not here?
translation.it: - Dov'è Henry? - Non è qui. Perché non è qui?

translation.en: He... he wanted to go home.
-He said he wanted to go. -I specifically told you to stay here!
translation.it: - Voleva... - Vi avevo detto di rimanere qui.

translation.en: Why would you let him leave? What am I supposed to do? Chain him to the radiator?
translation.it: - Perché l'hai lasciato andare? - Dovevo incatenarlo al termosifone?

translation.en: -Where is he gonna go? -[Cissy] He wanted to go home!
Oh, my God. You gotta be kidding--
Shit, he's FaceTiming me.
Henry doesn't know how to FaceTime.
translation.it: Non sa come si usa FaceTime.

translation.en: What do you want?
I want us to sit down and talk and throw everything on the table.
translation.it: Voglio parlare e mettere tutte le carte sul tavolo.

translation.en: Work this out before...
I have to kill Henry here.
Hey. Don't touch him.
You hear me? Do not touch him.
These guys are a bunch of idiots, Spenser.
translation.it: - Sono un branco di idioti. - Spenser.

translation.en: -Spenser... -[Spenser] Put Driscoll back on.
Fuck 'em. Hang up. He hit me in the eye.
Where are ya? I'll come there right now.
Wonderland. One hour.
I'm on my way.
And bring my drug shipment.
translation.it: E porta il mio carico di droga.

translation.en: What are we gonna do?
You're with me?
-Look. -[Hawk] Mmm. Wonderland is basically like an abandoned fortress.
translation.it: Guarda, Wonderland è una fortezza abbandonata. D'accordo?

translation.en: And there's pretty much only one way in, right here.
It's the middle of the day. There's not a lot of places to hide.
translation.it: È pieno giorno, non possiamo nasconderci.

translation.en: We're gonna have to get Henry out of the way.
And I got a plan.
It's a little unconventional. You're gonna have to trust me.
translation.it: È un po' insolito. Dovrai fidarti di me.

translation.en: No, no, no. No, you don't get the cool gun.
translation.it: No, non puoi prenderti l'arma più figa.

translation.en: Aw. Hawk is the name of a motherfucker with a shotgun.
translation.it: Hawk è un nome da stronzo col fucile.

translation.en: Spenser does your taxes.
That was good. I'll give you that one.
All right.
[Henry] You know, I'd really love to understand the process of why you took me as a hostage.
translation.it: Mi piacerebbe molto capire perché mi hai preso in ostaggio.

translation.en: Nobody's gonna come for me.
I got about three minutes left in me.
Nobody gives a shit if I live or die. I don't even care much if I live or die.
translation.it: A nessuno frega un cazzo se vivo o muoio. Me compreso!

translation.en: You hit me in the eye. What you hit me in the eye for?
translation.it: Mi hai colpito a un occhio. Perché?

translation.en: I was sitting, minding my own business.
translation.it: Ero seduto, mi facevo gli affari miei.

translation.en: You come in, I say, "Hello," and you hit me in the eye.
translation.it: Ti vedo arrivare, ti saluto e tu mi colpisci a un'occhio.

translation.en: -I gotta go to the bathroom. -Henry.
-What? -[Driscoll] Henry.
I will gag you, old-timer.
Gag me or not, I still gotta go to the bathroom.
translation.it: Fa' pure, ma devo comunque andare in bagno.

translation.en: Who's running point on this shit-show?
Get that fuckin' sword out of my face. Do you work at a Brazilian steakhouse?
translation.it: Togli quella spada dalla mia faccia. Lavori in un ristorante brasiliano?

translation.en: Are you kidding me?
[Driscoll] Where's Spenser?
[Cissy] You degenerates. This is how you treat
translation.it: Razza di idioti! È così che si tratta un vecchio?

translation.en: an old man, a poor mentally-challenged old man?
translation.it: Razza di idioti! È così che si tratta un vecchio? Un povero vecchio con problemi psichici?

translation.en: -Let's go, Henry. -I'm not mentally challenged.
translation.it: Andiamo, Henry. - Non ho problemi psichici. - Zitto. Sei sotto shock.

translation.en: Shut up, Henry! You're in shock. Come sit down.
translation.it: - Non ho problemi psichici. - Zitto. Sei sotto shock. - Vieni qui, siediti. - Che ci fai qui?

translation.en: -You got a... -What're you doin' here?
translation.it: - Vieni qui, siediti. - Che ci fai qui?

translation.en: ...prostate the size of a grapefruit.
translation.it: Hai la prostata grossa come un pompelmo.

translation.en: -Come here. Just sit down. -[Henry] Where's Spenser?
Shame on you! Did they violate you?
translation.it: - Dov'è Spenser? - Vergogna! - Ti hanno violentato? - No!

translation.en: -Sexually? -No.
What are you talking about?
-Did you engage in ass-play? -No!
-[Cissy] You can tell me-- -Bitch, please.
Stop playin'.
Where's Spenser?
I can't tell you that.
I will blow your fuckin' head off.
translation.it: Ti faccio saltare la testa, cazzo.

translation.en: What the fuck?
Holy shit!
This is your plan?
My plan only went as far as the entrance, okay?
translation.it: Il piano arrivava solo fin qui.

translation.en: -Shit! -[Henry] Spenser!
[pants] I gotta get to Driscoll.
-Okay, go get him. I got you. -[Spenser] All right.
translation.it: Va' a prenderlo. Ti copro. D'accordo.

translation.en: [man] He's over there!
[Spenser] Oh, shit!
Shit.
That's how you throw a fuckin' punch!
translation.it: È così che si tirano i pugni!

translation.en: It's over.
What, are you gonna shoot me?
How did you kill Officer Terrence Graham?
translation.it: Come hai ucciso l'agente Terrence Graham?

translation.en: What'd you do?
Wrap his hand around the gun, make it look like a suicide?
translation.it: Gli hai messo la mano sulla pistola perché sembrasse un suicidio?

translation.en: You have your boys hold him still for you?
translation.it: I tuoi ragazzi lo tenevano fermo?

translation.en: I mean, cops killing cops?
When did that ever become okay?
[sighs] Well...
So, what are you gonna do?
You know what I'm gonna do.
You're goin' to prison.
First, I'm gonna teach you a lesson.
translation.it: Ma prima ti insegnerò una lezione.

translation.en: Yeah? What's that?
Oh, a cop in prison's gotta know how to fight.
translation.it: In prigione devi saper fare a pugni.

translation.en: You take my word for that.
-[gun clatters] -Let's go.
Oh, let's.
-[sighs] I'm sick of your shit. -Come on.
-You think you're special? -Let's go.
Oh, you're not a fuckin' choirboy.
You're a fuckin' jailbird! Fuck you!
translation.it: Sei un avanzo di galera. Vaffanculo!

translation.en: [Spenser groans] Fuckin'...
I gave you a chance, brother.
-[Driscoll] Fuck your chance. -Fuck!
You ain't got what it takes to make it in prison, you know why?
translation.it: Non hai la stoffa per la prigione. Sai perché?

translation.en: 'Cause you're weak.
[breathing heavily] Come on.
Your stupid Serpico morality, it doesn't work in the real world.
translation.it: La tua stupida etica alla Serpico non funziona nel mondo reale.

translation.en: [Spenser grunts] Mother... [panting] Come on, baby. Let's go.
[Driscoll] Yeah, baby.
-[grunting] -You were always so fuckin' naive! Huh? You thought you could help the victims?
translation.it: Sei sempre stato così ingenuo. Pensavi di poter aiutare le vittime?

translation.en: You ain't helping shit.
Always some endless fuckin' need for sympathy. Oh, please, that's shit!
translation.it: Sempre quel bisogno di compassione. Ti prego, che stronzata!

translation.en: You hear me? You ain't helping no one.
translation.it: - Mi hai sentito? Non aiuterai nessuno. - Cazzo.

translation.en: There's no justice, Spenser!
There's only the strong and the weak.
They gonna find your body wherever I dump it.
translation.it: Troveranno il tuo corpo dove lo butterò

translation.en: They gonna put chalk around you, boy. You gonna die.
translation.it: e faranno la sagoma col gesso. Morirai.

translation.en: Henry, too.
And I'm gonna walk these motherfuckin' streets!
translation.it: E io camminerò per la cazzo di strada!

translation.en: Forever.
You know what, bad guy?
I'm gonna serve some justice today.
translation.it: Oggi farò un po' di giustizia.

translation.en: I'm gonna make a citizen's arrest.
You're under arrest.
You save the bad guy talk for the boys in whatever federal prison you go to.
translation.it: Risparmia i discorsi da cattivo per i ragazzi in prigione.

translation.en: You can tell 'em I said hello.
Damn.
You boys is fucked.
[chuckling] Fucked.
[news anchor] Breaking news.
A shocking turn of events have rocked South Boston.
translation.it: Una serie sconvolgente di eventi ha scosso South Boston.

translation.en: The FBI, in cooperation with the BPD, announced tonight
translation.it: L'FBI, con il dipartimento di polizia, ha dichiarato

translation.en: that several top-ranking Boston police officers
translation.it: che diverse personalità di spicco della polizia di Boston

translation.en: have been arrested on charges of corruption and racketeering.
translation.it: sono state arrestate per corruzione e spaccio.

translation.en: Chief among these charges is the framing of Boston Police Officer Terrence Graham.
translation.it: L'agente della polizia di Boston Terrence Graham era stato incastrato.

translation.en: BPD has released an official apology to Graham's family
translation.it: Il dipartimento ha divulgato delle scuse ufficiali per la sua famiglia

translation.en: and have announced that Terrence Graham has been posthumously cleared
translation.it: e ha annunciato che Terrence Graham è stato scagionato

translation.en: of all charges relating to the gruesome death of Captain John Boylan.
translation.it: di ogni accusa relativa alla macabra morte del capitano John Boylan.

translation.en: The fallen hero will receive a Boston PD burial with full honors.
translation.it: L'eroe caduto riceverà una sepoltura con tutti gli onori

translation.en: Daddy.
A scholarship is also being set up for his young son Rowan.
translation.it: È stata inoltre istituita una borsa di studio per il figlio, Roland.

translation.en: We'll have more on this top story as it continues to develop.
translation.it: Vi terremo aggiornati su questa vicenda.

translation.en: Come on.
You want Hawk to come to see you, huh?
translation.it: Vuoi che Hawk vega a salutarti?

translation.en: [Cissy] You know she doesn't understand a word you're sayin'.
translation.it: Sai che non capisce una parola?

translation.en: She understands everything I say.
No. She's just waiting for you to give her a treat.
translation.it: Aspetta che tu le dia un biscotto.

translation.en: You look good.
I know.
You wanna take me for lunch?
translation.it: - Mi offri il pranzo? - Cosa vorresti mangiare?

translation.en: -What do you wanna eat? -I want you to buy me a lobster.
translation.it: - Mi offri il pranzo? - Cosa vorresti mangiare? Voglio un'aragosta.

translation.en: You want me to buy you a lobster? I want you to buy me a whole fuckin' lobster.
translation.it: - Vuoi un'aragosta? - Voglio una cazzo di aragosta.

translation.en: Are you gonna eat it or... No, I'm gonna throw it in your face.
translation.it: - La mangi o... - Te la tiro in faccia.

translation.en: Yeah, I'm gonna eat it. I'm starvin'.
-Come on, Pearl. [whistles] Come on. -[Pearl barks]
[Cissy] You did good this time.
[Spenser] You know what? That was sweet.
Here's to a family that stays in the game, huh?
[muffled] The celebratory lobster life.
I worked on a lobster boat for ten months...
translation.it: Ho lavorato su una nave da pesca per le aragoste per dieci mesi.

translation.en: long time ago.
Seen them pulling up box after box of those poor lobster bastards,
translation.it: Sollevavo scatole e scatole piene di quelle povere aragoste

translation.en: with their little eyes staring at me like little lost children with claws.
translation.it: che mi fissavano come dei bambini spersi, con le chele.

translation.en: -Like this one? -Yeah.
It's charming. It's what makes you you.
translation.it: È affascinante. È il bello di te.

translation.en: [muffled] You wanna take a little historical review of where that hot dog of yours has been?
translation.it: Vuoi fare una revisione storica di dove è stato il tuo wurstel?

translation.en: -[chuckles] -[Henry] What? I was just telling them a little bit about my past.
translation.it: Cosa? Ho solo raccontato del mio passato.

translation.en: -You don't know anything about me. -[Cissy] You're disgusting.
translation.it: - Tu non sai niente di me. - È disgustoso.

translation.en: -[man] Hey, Frodo. -[Cissy] Fuck, yeah! [reporter on TV] An arrest has been made today
translation.it: - È orribile. - Oggi è stato effettuato un arresto

translation.en: in connection with the arson at Saint Aidan's church.
translation.it: per l'incendio della chiesa di Saint Aidan.

translation.en: Whoa. Saint Aidan's church burned down?
translation.it: La chiesa di Saint Aidan è stata incendiata?

translation.en: Two years ago, when you were in prison.
translation.it: Due anni fa, mentre eri in prigione.

translation.en: Boston Battalion Chief Foley is being brought out right now by the police.
translation.it: Il capo del Battaglione di Boston, Foley, viene scortato fuori dalla polizia.

translation.en: I'm a firefighter. I was set up. I swear to God, I didn't do this.
translation.it: Mi hanno incastrato. Giuro su Dio, non sono stato io.

translation.en: -Henry, I went to high school with him. -Oh, shit.
translation.it: - Andavo al liceo con lui. - Merda.

translation.en: Somebody change that channel. The Bruins are playing.
translation.it: Qualcuno cambi canale. Giocano i Bruins!

translation.en: [reporter] Two Boston firefighters died in the blaze. I have kids. I would never do this.
translation.it: Due pompieri di Boston sono morti tra le fiamme.

translation.en: I swear to God, I would never do this. I need help!
translation.it: Giuro su Dio, non lo farei mai. Mi serve aiuto!

translation.en: -No. -The Bruins, please!
I need help!
-I need help. I need help. -[Cissy] No. No!
[Henry] The Bruins!
